verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:19
verses.text: For though I be free from all men, yet have I made myself servant unto all, that I might gain the more.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:20
verses.text: And unto the Jews I became as a Jew, that I might gain the Jews; to them that are under the law, as under the law, that I might gain them that are under the law;

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:21
verses.text: To them that are without law, as without law, (being not without law to God, but under the law to Christ,) that I might gain them that are without law.
